pageContent:
Deepika Suresh Kumar 
Atlanta GA| (720) 222-9922 | deepika.sureshkumar@hotmail.com  
 
 
Profile 
 
Highly accomplished Technical Lead with over 12 years of total experience in the IT industry specializing in business 
analysis, data analytics and application development across Finance, Retail and Educational domains. Motivated and 
detailed-oriented professional skilled at providing analysis for data-driven decision- making and process optimization. 
Excellent communication and customer relationship management skills with the ability to present complex analysis and 
insights in a straightforward manner that is easily understood by audiences of varying levels and experiences. Adept at 
providing efficient solutions, utilizing technology, and working effectively with all levels of an organization.   
 
Core Competencies  
 
Database | Web Application Development| Data Visualization | Data Analysis & Reporting | Cloud | Web Analytics |

Core Competencies  
 
Database | Web Application Development| Data Visualization | Data Analysis & Reporting | Cloud | Web Analytics | 
Software Development Lifecycle Management |Project Management  
  
Skills 
 
Database | SQL Server, Oracle, Google Big Query (GBQ), Cloud Spanner  
Data Visualization | Power BI, Tableau 
Cloud | Google Big Query, GCS bucket, Pub/sub cloud shell 
Web Analytics | Google Web Analytics, Google Tag Manager 
Web & UI Development | Asp.Net, C#, WCF Services, HTML, CSS, XML  
Dev Tools | Visual Studio, SharePoint Designer, Visio, Visual Studio Safe, Team foundation studio, DB Weaver 
Other Tools | Service Now, JIRA, Confluence, Excel, Jenkins 
 
 
Professional Experience 
 
 
o Technical Lead, Macy’s Technologies, Atlanta GA (Jun’22 to Current) 
o Business Analyst, Georgia State University, Atlanta GA (Jul’17 to Nov’17) 
o Business Analyst/ Technical Lead, Global Payments, Atlanta GA (Nov’15 to Apr’16)

o Business Analyst, Georgia State University, Atlanta GA (Jul’17 to Nov’17) 
o Business Analyst/ Technical Lead, Global Payments, Atlanta GA (Nov’15 to Apr’16)  
o Application Analyst Associate, University of Georgia, Altana, GA (Oct’13 to Oct’15) 
o Software Engineer, Microsoft, Chennai India (Nov’09 to Jun’12) 
 
 
Education 
 
 
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics & Communication Engineering, Anna University, India 
 
 
Certifications 
 
 
• Scrum Master – PSM 1 (Perusing)

Work Experience  
 
Technical Lead, Macy’s – Infosys, Atlanta, GA - USA                          Jun 2022 – Current 
• Working as a Technical Lead for Inventory Validation Services Application for Macys and Bloomingdales website. 
• Created Google Cloud Storage (GCS) buckets, maintaining and utilizing the policy management of these buckets 
and used GCS cold line for storage and backup on Google cloud.  
• Loaded multiple Data sources on incremental basis to Big Query raw using GCS bucket and Shell Script. 
• Process and load bound and unbound Data from Google pub/subtopic to Big Query using cloud Dataflow. 
• Efficient coordination with offshore team and client so that resolutions are met on time without impacting the 
sales volume and comfortable working independently. 
 
Analyst/ Marketing Lead, Startup- Creative PuppetZ- Atlanta, GA  Jan 2018 – Current  
• Worked as a Marketing Lead to design & promote products by interacting with customers, designers, and implemented

• Worked as a Marketing Lead to design & promote products by interacting with customers, designers, and implemented 
web analytics using google analytics, tag manager. 
• Took complete ownership of the product from the Ideation to launch by performing competitive market study to 
identify the key features.  
• Collaborated with web designers to design and build a parenting, children’s product blog that covers parenting 
techniques, children’s books, toys, and screen free children’s activities.  
 
Business Analyst, Georgia State University, Atlanta, GA – USA                                                        Jul 2017 – Nov 2017 
• Served as Functional Analyst on requirement gathering phase for College of Arts & Science HR application. 
• Maintained and managed weekly updates in CAS website using Confluence.  
• Analyzed the requirements and formulated the business scenarios, process modeling, data-flow diagramming

• Maintained and managed weekly updates in CAS website using Confluence.  
• Analyzed the requirements and formulated the business scenarios, process modeling, data-flow diagramming 
using MS Visio and worked on system testing use cases, performed task tracking using JIRA. 
• Prepared POC to convert existing excel reports to Power BI dashboards/reports. 
 
Business Analyst/ Technical Lead, Global Payments – Atlanta, GA                                             Nov 2015 –Apr 2016 
• Worked as Techno-Business lead for MOSS-AP, MOSS-UK and MOSS-CANADA payment processing application 
using .NET, SQL Server, SharePoint, JIRA, and Visio. 
• Engaged in assessing payment flow business scenarios, identified application elements and developed BRD, FRD 
and URD. 
• Involved in discussions with teams from various geo locations such as UK, Japan and India.  
• Worked as an interface with developers and business stakeholders for quick task completion.

• Involved in discussions with teams from various geo locations such as UK, Japan and India.  
• Worked as an interface with developers and business stakeholders for quick task completion.  
• Liaise with end users to test application software, ensuring accuracy and completeness to achieve desired 
results. 
 
Application Analyst Associate, University of Georgia – Athens, GA                                          Nov 2013 – Oct 2015 
• Worked as an Application Analyst to design and develop UGA – EITS Elements application using Visual Studio. 
• Created various console applications using SQL Server procedures and performed business analysis. 
• Extensively involved in knowledge transition sessions with Elements team (London) to understand the 
Application Framework and documented the workflow process Worked in AWS S3 to migrate the Elements 
application. Implemented Data reconciliation application to validate source data from various feeds such as HR

application. Implemented Data reconciliation application to validate source data from various feeds such as HR 
feed, Education feed, Address feed, Institutional appointments, Workload, and schedule teaching.  
 
Software Engineer, Microsoft, Infosys, Chennai, India                                   Nov 2009 – Jun 2012 
• Worked as an application developer for windows, web application, SQL server and SharePoint related tasks for 
Microsoft client. 
• Worked as a Web developer in using MS SharePoint, MS Visual studio designing web applications and windows 
applications. 
• Created and modified Master pages, Web pages, Web parts and added new features in existing web parts using 
SharePoint.  
• Extensive experience in web-based pages, site designs using HTML, CSS, Themes, Master Pages, Site Map, 
JavaScript and AJAX and implemented both client and server site validations wherever necessary.
